---
name: update-contributing
description: Generate or update `CONTRIBUTING.md` with guidelines for contributing to the project
---
Before updating the contributing file, identify the target repository folder within the workspace. Ask the user which folder to target or infer it from context (open file paths, workspace roots) and operate against that folder.

Update or create `CONTRIBUTING.md` for this project with the following verbatim content:

```markdown
# CONTRIBUTING

This is a personal project which I use to learn and apply new tools, technologies, approaches and generally to learn through. As such I am not looking for any direct contributions however I am always open to constructive feedback, feature requests and issues being raised.
```
